review: Everything about this thing is awesome except one thing... is there not a way to get this thing to show what time it is?Other than that this has made TV watching so simple and easy compared to watching netflix, hulu, etc on my ps3.  I got this actually so I could watch the HBOGo app which wasn't supported on my ps3 (at least not at that time, i don't know if it is now).  Even if you already have something like a PS3, this is still worth the $100 bucks for how much easier it makes life.
